hero_title: Hanya Mafi Inganci Don Gudanar da Kuɗin Kasuwancin Ka
hero_subtitle: Daga lissafin kuɗi zuwa bin diddigin kashe kuɗi, Digit-Tally ya kawo duk abin da kuke buƙata don gudanar da kasuwancin ku a wuri guda, mai sauƙi da ƙarfi.
features_title: Duk Abin da Kake Buƙata, Babu Wanda Ba Ka Buƙata
feature_1_desc: Ƙirƙiri kuma aika da daftarin ƙwararru a cikin daƙiƙa.
feature_2_desc: Haɗa bankin ku kuma bi sawun kashe kuɗi ta atomatik.
feature_3_desc: Sarrafa kayan ajiyar ku a ainihin lokaci.
pricing_title: Farashi Mai Sauƙi Ga Kowane Kasuwanci
